name: The Architect (itch) (Oktanel)
description:
The Architect

The Architect  is singleplayer puzzle game. in this game we act as an architect who build a railroads. You need to manage resources and time while building tracks for the railroad.

Member Team:

Game Designer

Dimas Prabowo

Programmer

Dimas Prabowo & Requelme Hugo

Visual Artist

Naufal Afif & Hadid Febrian

Sound Designer

Gardeneo Harra
